abstract: Citigroup has agreed to pay Enron creditors $1.66 billion as the final part of a settlement of a lawsuit over banks’ responsibility in the energy trading firm’s downfall, a group representing creditors said on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup has agreed to pay Enron creditors $1.66 billion as the final part of a settlement of a lawsuit over banks’ responsibility in the energy trading firm’s downfall, a group representing creditors said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Citi Strikes $1.66 Billion Settlement With Enron Creditors
